sentences.sContent: My fingers were so numb I could hardly write.
sentences.sCn: 我的手指麻木得几乎没法写字。

sentences.sContent: The anaesthetic made his whole face go numb.
sentences.sCn: 麻醉剂使他整个脸都失去了知觉。

synos.tran: 使麻木；使发愣；使失去感觉

remMethod.val: 数字(number)化的年代让人麻木(numb)

words.tran: 使麻木的；使失去感觉的

trans.tranOther: a part of your body that is numb is unable to feel anything, for example because you are very cold
